sub_title: Director, Product Operations at PAR Technology
summary: I’m a results-oriented technology professional with 18 years of experience in the industry. With a self-driven attitude, I’ve successfully led distributed teams to deliver high-value, high-impact projects at small and large sized firms. An advocate of meritocracy, I believe in empowering my team and trusting them to get the job done. I’m an ardent believer of continuous improvement and inspire my team to practice the same. My work experience reflects my passion for eCommerce and related domains. My educational foundation includes an MBA from the Rotman School of Management, University of Toronto (2013) and a Bachelor in Software Engg. from McMaster University (2006).

school.name: University of Toronto - Rotman School of Management

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:	
•	Led a software development team to fulfill marketing technology requirements of clients primarily on the Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) enterprise platform
•	Completed project to asses complexity of AEM upgrade from version 6.1 to 6.4
•	Played a lead role in a 2 year multi-million-dollar re-design of Atlantic Canada’s online portal www.alc.ca on the AEM 6.1 platform. Site implementation included various complex web services integrations
•	Provided technical consultancy, oversight and leadership to internal and client development teams
•	Provided career development and mentorship to 4 official reports  
•	Participated in client and external vendor meetings to gather requirements, presenting solutions and status updates to Senior Executive teams
•	Collaborated with the Project Director and Project Manager on a periodic basis to review project management activities and removing roadblocks
•	Prioritized development items, distributing them to team members and ensuring they’re fulfilled by committed dates 
•	Engaged in hands-on software development using Agile methodology 
•	Defined new initiatives to enable team growth and enhancing team productivity 
•	Generated technical documentation for client training and internal purposes
•	Assisted in the on-boarding of new technical team members
•	Trained on the latest marketing technology and software development trends and evaluating their impact on client services and operations
profile_positions.title: Principal Engineer (Development Manager)

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:	
•	Conceptualized the idea to build Oliogo, a B2B eCommerce marketplace dedicated to industrial products 
•	Performed market research on the North American industrial sector and formulated the business strategy to position Oliogo in the right market niche
•	Developed a prototype application with the objective to validate and refine the business model 
•	Shortlisted potential clients for the application and participated in industrial trade shows to demonstrate, gather interest and collect feedback
•	Evaluated response from potential clients and generated a product roadmap to build the MVP
•	Researched and evaluated feasible product architectures and viable technologies that could be leveraged for product development  
•	Recruited four team members with a diverse technical skill set to contribute in the product design 
and development
•	Planned and scheduled monthly development releases on GitLab and distributed assignments to 
3 team members (on-shore and off-shore)
•	Setup a staging development environment with a continuous integration process for agile development
•	Developed the application using LAMP stack (built on top of the WooCommerce eCommerce platform) and the latest web technologies including Bootstrap framework, jQuery etc.
•	Deployed the site to Production on AWS and optimized all aspects including page speed, SEO, caching etc.
•	Documented the site architecture and all major product features on the GitLab Project Wiki	

Technologies: WooCommerce, PHP, MySQL, Ubuntu, Apache Web Server, Bootstrap CSS & JS, jQuery, CSS3, HTML5, XML, REST, Apache Solr Search, Redis Cache, Git, GitLab & Eclipse
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Managed the R&D team consisting of 14 members – 1 team lead, 1 software architect, 8 software developers (5 senior), 3 quality assurance analysts and 1 technical writer to build and maintain an enterprise level SaaS based eCommerce application 
•	Recruited and trained new team members in the Toronto and Bangalore (India) development centres
•	Played a pivotal role in setting up the development centre of 10 members in Bangalore with two visits in a span of 1 year
•	Performed yearly performance reviews for all reports, assisting them in setting career objectives with growth plans and providing them with necessary resources
•	Conducted 1-on-1 meetings on a periodic basis with all team members to engage them in a 2-way feedback process
•	Planned Product Releases – collaborated with other departments i.e. Product Development, Support, Client Services and Operations to collect and prioritize development items to be included in quarterly releases 
•	Managed the development cycle for product releases including requirements analysis, development, quality assurance and documentation 
•	Oversaw the build management process and planning deployments on staging and production environments
•	Managed major development projects using both Agile (ScrumBan) and Waterfall based methodologies
•	Conducted routine status update meetings with the Development and QA teams to monitor progress and keep the geographically diverse teams connected 
•	Generated status reports to monitor utilization and productivity of all team members
•	Periodically defined, reviewed, documented, and enforced policies and best practices for Development and QA teams
•	Kept up to date on the latest business (eCommerce) and technological trends and evaluated their impact on company products and operations
profile_positions.title: Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Coached new members of the development team to learn the core application code and development processes
•	Gathered and analyzed feature requirements to generate design specification documents
•	Scoped and prioritized tasks for release planning, provided time estimates to include in level of effort documents for clients
•	Assisted the Client Services and Support team in resolving urgent client issues
profile_positions.title: Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed the front-end and back-end platform architecture for major platform features with implementations in Java, Velocity, HTML, Javascript and jQuery
•	Designed database schemas and created SQL scripts on IBM DB2
•	Generated test plans for quality assurance and assisted the quality assurance team in execution of these plans
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and developed standalone applications in Java to automate system test of IBM DB2 DB resulting in significant time savings for the QA team
• Achieved the highest grade possible in the work term evaluation
profile_positions.title: Internship-Software Development

skills: Java, Spring, IBM DB2 (UDB), SQL, Velocity, HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, SOAP
